Participants.evidence: 545 patients with clinical stage IA LUL adenocarcinoma who underwent surgery between January 2018 and May 2022

Objective.evidence: This study aimed to develop and validate a nomogram to predict high-risk pathology in clinical stage IA lung adenocarcinoma located in the left upper lobe (LUL)

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: The cohort was randomly divided into training (80%) and validation (20%) sets

Number_Randomised.evidence: 545 patients with clinical stage IA LUL adenocarcinoma who underwent surgery between January 2018 and May 2022

Result_Outcome.evidence: The nomogram demonstrated excellent discriminative ability, with AUCs of 0.837 in the training set and 0.865 in the validation set
